10.4.19  4:08 pm   would you rather be bored or stressed?

      amped!!!!!!!!!

10.4.19  3:36 pm   are ducks raiding your home?

      not anymore. this whole damn place is duck proof, finally

10.4.19  3:12 pm   hello bill. i have ptsd and i'm going to therapy soon. any ideas on how to avoid and/or quickly forget stuff during an intrusion until then? i'll gratefully take anything that might help or nothing if you got nothing. idk. keep making the world a _place. cya.

      this is just a wild guess, but i think singing could be extremely useful

10.4.19  3:03 pm   Is wyoming real?

      i have no idea

10.4.19  3:01 pm   if you could ban 1 phrase, what would it be?

      oh nice try, you are trying to get me to say it, which is totally the opposite of banning it

10.4.19  2:48 pm   Should I start to stop or stop starting

      neither

10.4.19  2:27 pm   what if there weren't beans? what would all the people who eat beans do?

      surely evaporate

10.4.19  2:18 pm   if a liquid represented you, what liquid would it be

      water

10.4.19  2:10 pm   will you ever do css that isnt inline

      check the top of the page dummy. actually forget it, i think you are reading the page wrong anyway

10.4.19  1:38 pm   Thoughts on grilled cheese sandwiches 

      very difficult to ungrill. once you grill that cheese, there is no turning back

10.4.19  1:29 pm   what do you think about me?

     you are pretty friendly

      and, how can you describe yourself in a sentence, bill?

      if i were allowed to be myself then i wouldn't have to describe myself. let someone else do the honors

10.4.19  1:27 pm   in the thumbnail for hotewig is the blue circle with the green line thing supposed to be earth or does the green squiggle represent something different

      it's the world

10.4.19  1:24 pm   Hey Bill, I was planning on putting on some of your music for my college's radio station as part of a weekly segment on non-mainstream artists, and I wanted to know what song you felt is the best representation of the kind of stuff you do?

      none of them

10.4.19  1:23 pm   Have you ever listen to a piece of music but couldn't tell where the 1 (down beat) was at first but then eventually figured it out?

      yes

10.4.19  12:53 pm   is there a combination of i'll verb your noun that doesn't sound like an innuendo?

      i'll suck your dick

10.4.19  12:52 pm   what is your oppinoin on bad spelling

      i assume that's your opinion, on your spelling

10.4.19  12:20 pm   Do you think the same way you speak?

      i speak the same way i think

10.4.19  11:51 am   I always feel like I put too high of expectations on myself, then try to curb this by continually raising my expectations. How do I stop this?

      live up to them!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

10.4.19  11:50 am   Do you have any plans to add to the "reality" page?

      until the day i die

10.4.19  11:24 am   hello bill. one thing we know is that before you started your technological transformation, you had been making a video for already finished song. since apparently your setup is, for the lack of a better term, almost ready for making new content, what's the current plan?

     write

      are you going to finish the unfinished video and release it?

     yes but not first

      or did you scrap it and start making new video for that song?

     that video will be the video for that song. it's too good already

10.4.19  11:12 am   im confused with being 

      that makes sense

10.4.19  10:07 am   are rats real?

      yes, that's so kind of you to ask

10.4.19  9:41 am   whats the most important thing in life?

      time

10.4.19  8:38 am   Who will win the Super Bowl?

      the NFL

10.4.19  8:32 am   What does Monday taste like

      a piece of paper

10.4.19  8:09 am   Bill! where have you been

     IN THE STUDIO

      and are there new things happening and coming up that you will share with us?

     they are too ridiculous, i'm almost drooling all over the floor. i haven't made anything yet, but the future is verfiably ridiculous let me assure you

10.4.19  7:59 am   just set up an X stand for a 61-key keyboard and  it's wobbling, is this normal

      not really. the problem is either on the floor, in the stand, or in the keyboard, or hopefully just how you placed the keyboard

10.4.19  7:55 am   Am I supposed to hit the side of the cowbell or the edge with the bottom facing outwards?

      hit it in every way you can think of. get accustomed to all the different sounds you can get. then you can choose what sound you want each time you hit it

10.4.19  7:41 am   Why does life exist? 

      because it would be so ridiculous

10.4.19  7:28 am   why do you think everybody is so interested in your favorite video/song you've made? seems kind of weird to ask somebody what their favorite thing is out of all the things they themselves made

      yes, but apparently it's simply the trusted way of the universe. i've just watched a dozen interviews with the friends cast, and no one seemed to care about what it's like to make the show, they just wanted to know what the best episode is

10.4.19  6:51 am   is the timer at 73 yet?

      no

10.4.19  5:26 am   how does your countdown timer work?

      it's made up. i just make it up

10.4.19  5:03 am   On a scale from one to pretty big, how big is the project you are working on right now

      pretty big, wait what project

      some sort of tube, i suspect

      wear a cloak, but just around your waist

      rainbow

      the ability to win friends and influence people

      apply for a job

      getting too freakin old

      to make you stronger, maybe become god one day

      waht the hek

      it's so fantastic

      yes!!!!!!!
